module.description-long: Reports a touch type experienced on the iCub skin (e.g. caress or poke). Using: Simply run aware touch, and it will populate the opc with a relation of type (iCub, is, caress, touchLocation).

param.desc: To specify the file containing the advanced configuration
To specify the file containing the standard configuration

server.description: Receive tactile data from the skin
